  • Creative, adaptable, and growth-driven machine learning engineer with expertise in many languages and cloud platforms such as AWS.
  • Proven success in leading cross-functional teams and implementing data-driven solutions to drive significant business growth, improve customer satisfaction, and enhance operational efficiency.
  • Advanced academic background with three master's degrees in Business Administration, Data Science, and Computer Science, complemented by extensive international experience.

    • As a seasoned machine learning professional with 9 years of experience, I have a proven track record of driving business growth through data-driven solutions. My expertise spans across a range of industries, from retail, travel and hospitality to manufacturing and education. I have a strong business and technical background with three master's degrees (MSc in Computer Science, MSc in Data Science, and MSc in Business Administration with a focus on International Business). Having lived and worked extensively throughout Europe, Asia, and America, I bring a unique perspective on global markets and cultures.

    In my previous role at a travel technology unicorn startup in South Korea, I led a cross-functional team to achieve a 90x revenue growth for the company. Through advanced analytics and data modeling, I improved customer satisfaction by 20%, reduced costs by 15%, and increased efficiency by 30%.

    In my current role, my duties encompass leading teams of engineers and data scientists, developing and implementing scalable machine learning solutions, and driving projects that improve customer satisfaction and operational efficiency. I am responsible for designing and maintaining machine learning pipelines, creating predictive models, and ensuring seamless collaboration between business and technical teams. Additionally, I oversee the integration of machine learning frameworks, manage project budgets, and uphold data governance standards.

    I always bring new perspectives to solving problems. Ideally, I am looking for an AI/ML engineering position to get more exposure in advancing the state of the art where I can make an impact in changing the world.

    I love learning about new technologies. Check out my portfolios in projects section.

    Feel free to browse the projects section to check out what I've built, send me an email or connect with me on LinkedIn.
